title: is my asus notebook able to handle league?
body: hey guys, i recently just bought an asus notebook and i was wondering if it was good enough to handle league, heres the information about the notebook, http://www.thegoodguys.com.au/asus-156-inches-core-i5-750gb-notebook-f552ldv-sx965h thank you :)

replies.body:
Here is an analysis based on the system requirements and your specifications. you may be able to run the game on its lowest settings

http://www.game-debate.com/games/index.php?g_id=17114&game=League+of+Legends&p_make=Intel&p_deriv=Core+i5-4200U+1.6GHz&gc_make=Intel&gc_deriv=Intel+HD+Graphics+Mobile&ram=4&checkSubmit=#systemRequirements

no worries :)
good luck and probably see you on the rift!
